content: on each side ch2 in each corner border2 slip_stitch into ch2 space from previous round stdc in ch2 space ch2 2dc in same ch2 space double_crochet in each single_crochet across 2dc ch2 2dc in ch2 space omitting last corner double_crochet in ch2 space before first double_crochet of the round slip_stitch to first double_crochet to finish round +4 double_crochet in each side ch2 in each corner © jade taylor of black holes and unicorns crochet you may make and sell items created from this pattern but please credit me as the designer this pattern is not to be distributed without proper credit to the designer 5 border3 slip_stitch into ch2 space in corner turn stdc in ch2 space ch2 double_crochet in same ch2 space * fpdc around next 2 st double_crochet in next st until there are 2 st left in the side fpdc around last 2 st double_crochet ch2 double_crochet in ch2 space* repeat three times fpdc around next 2 st double_crochet in next st until there are 2 st left in the side fpdc around last 2 st slip_stitch to first double_crochet to finish round +2 st in each side ch2 in each corner border4 slip_stitch into ch2 space in corner turn stdc in ch2 space ch2 2dc in same ch2 space * fpdc around next st double_crochet in next 2 st until there is 1 st left in the side fpdc around next st 2dc ch2 2dc in ch2 space* repeat three times fpdc around next st double_crochet in next 2 st until there is 1 st left in the side fpdc around last st double_crochet in ch2 space before first double_crochet of round slip_stitch to 1st double_crochet to finish round +4 st in each side ch2 in each corner repeat border3 and border4 until desired size is reached chart © jade taylor of black holes and unicorns crochet you may make and sell items created from this pattern but please credit me as the designer this pattern is not to be distributed without proper credit to the designer 6 blanket pattern the blanket shown here was made using 2 caron cakes for the c2c section and another 10 ply yarn for the border for this blanket i increased for 47 row giving 143 st then decreased making a total of 94 row i had 76 single_crochet across each edge for border1 25x3+1 st i had a total of 8 row of the border the blanket measured ~68 cm square after the c2c part and ~80 cm square with the border © jade taylor of black holes and unicorns crochet you may make and sell items created from this pattern but please credit me as the designer this pattern is not to be distributed without proper credit to the designer 7
